name: Ch15ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Tana;Cormag?|There you are.|Everyone's been looking for you.
speak;Cormag;Leave me be, Princess.|This doesn't concern you.
speak;Tana;What's wrong?|Your gripping your weapons so tightly...
speak;Cormag;Scouts reported Valter's forces nearby.|He's finally within my reach.
speak;Tana;Valter?|The man who killed your brother?
speak;Cormag;He didn't just kill Glen.|He butchered him like an animal!|Left him to rot in the sun!
speak;Cormag;I've waited too long already.|By dusk, either Valter dies by my hand,|or I join my brother.
speak;Tana;You can't be serious!|Facing him alone is suicide!
speak;Tana;Please, listen to me.|We can face him together, with the army.|There's no need for you to—
speak;Cormag;No!|This is between Valter and me.|No one else gets involved.
speak;Cormag;You don't understand what it's like.|To see your brother's body defiled.|To carry that image every waking moment!
speak;Tana;You're right. I don't understand that pain.
speak;Tana;But I do understand what it's like to fear for someone I care about!
speak;Cormag;Care?|You barely know me, Princess.|Save your concern for someone who wants it.
speak;Cormag;My mind is made up.|I leave now, while Valter's reach is within my grasp.
speak;Tana;This isn't justice!|This is blind rage!|Glen wouldn't want you to throw your life away!
speak;Cormag;Don't you dare speak of what my brother would want.|You didn't know him.
speak;Tana;I know he was a knight of honor.|And there's no honor in what you're planning.
speak;Cormag;Honor?|Honor died with Glen.|All that remains is vengeance.
speak;Tana;Please...|At least wait until morning.|Give yourself time to think clearly.
speak;Cormag;Every moment Valter draws breath is an insult to my brother's memory.|I've waited long enough.
speak;Tana;Then I'll tell Eirika!|She'll stop you from this madness!
speak;Cormag;By the time you reach him, I'll be gone.|Stay out of my way, Princess.|This isn't your fight.
speak;Tana;It becomes my fight when someone I... when a comrade rushes to his death!
speak;Cormag;My wyvern and I have faced worse odds.|Valter may be skilled, but his arrogance will be his undoing.
speak;Tana;And your anger will be yours!|Can't you see that?
speak;Tana;Fine!|Go get yourself killed!|See if I care!
speak;Tana;Just...|Just know that someone will mourn you.|Even if you're too stubborn to believe it.
speak;Tana;What do I do now?|If he faces Valter alone...|I can't just let him die.
speak;Tana;I need to find Eirika.|We have to stop him before it's too late.
